acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused person DIpak kalita is sentenced to under go R/I for a period of to 10 (Ten) years and also pay of fine of Rs. 10,000/- I/d of fine  to suffer further R/I of 10 (Ten) months
